name: Moon Corp. Tower Defense - Demo
description:
Aliens Down, Profits Up!

Build your Lunar Defense Company. Defend against invading aliens in this exhilarating Tower Defense and Business Simulator. Accept contracts, hire staff, conduct research, upgrade turrets, expand your office and protect the Moon. 


Defend against Alien Swarms. Create Unique Combinations of Weapons. Take Advantage of Alien Weaknesses. Upgrade and Specialize your Turrets.

Expand your Defense Company. Hire and Fire Employees to Research New Technologies. Customise your Office. Adopt an Office Cat!

Outsource your Defense needs with Special Abilities. Bring down the Orbital Laser. Call in an Airstrike. Drop Mechs.

This version is a Demo.  This version includes 4 missions from the game and various events in the player's office. Please send us your feedback as your input will shape the final game.

Available on Steam. If you prefer Steam, the demo is also free to download there. Leave a Wishlist if you like to keep watch for when the full game releases.
